channel.title: I need help with shops
channel.description: so i made a shop but how do i link it to a person i made the shop number 4 so i do ::shop 4 in game and it opens but i want to link it the a shopkeeper who doesnt have a shop i spawnt him in home guards so hes in the cords i want i just need help linking ::shop 4 to him thank you [size=36pt] I F YOU HAVE TEAM VIEWER AND WILL HELP ME ILL GIVE MAX REP![/size]

item.title: I need help with shops
item.dc:creator: @LearningToCode1 LearningToCode1
item.description:
@LearningToCode1 wrote:

If your using [pi] base I’m sure you go into “Actionhandler.java” and find “shop 4” then change the “npc id” to the id you changed your shop to, Then save, Compile, Run your done…

Read full topic
